body:
So, did Wii Emulator (Dolphin) support WiiU games?
And if it does, there is a Mario Kart 8 ROM? Can you give me the download of it?
body_tagged:

title: Wii Emulator questions

replies.body: You cannot get ROMS this early... The game only came out 3 days ago... Wait atleast a month.
